title: Talk & Chat in Discord on Your PS4, No Computer Necessary

steps.title: Open Library on your PS4.
steps.content: Open Library on your PS4. Scroll to the right and select the tile that looks like a bookshelf to see your library.

steps.title: Click Applications.
steps.content: Click Applications . It's in the menu on the left side of your screen and will show you apps that aren't labeled as "games."

steps.title: Click Internet Browser.
steps.content: Click Internet Browser . This will open the Internet Browser for your PS4.

steps.title: Go to the Discord site.
steps.content: Go to the Discord site. Enter "discord.com" into the address bar and press "Go." Discord will open in the browser on your PS4. If Discord isn't working on your browser, make sure you have Javascript enabled. Press the "Options" button on your controller and go to Settings > Enable Javascript .

steps.title: Sign in with your Discord account.
steps.content: Sign in with your Discord account. You should be prompted to log in immediately when you navigate to the website. You can use the QR code to log in with your phone or enter your Discord email and password. [1] X Research source Bookmark the site so you don't have to navigate to this page using the URL again. Instead, clicking the bookmark will let you access the Discord web browser quickly. You can now read and send chat messages or DMs on your PS4. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Plug in a headset with a mic to your controller.
steps.content: Plug in a headset with a mic to your controller. You can find lots of headsets made for PS4 controllers with built-in mics from many different electronic retailers. If you have a mic, you can simply select the voice chat from the web browser on your PS4 to join a voice chat and talk with other people.

steps.title: Use your smartphone and PS Remote Play.
steps.content: Use your smartphone and PS Remote Play. Alternatively, get PS Remote Play on your Android or iPhone and use your phone as a mic on PS4 . To do this, simply: [3] X Research source Download PS Remote Play on your Android or iPhone. On your PS4, go to Settings > Remote Play Connection Settings > Enable Remote Play > Add Device . Open the PS Remote Play app on your phone and log in with the same PS account that's currently logged into your PS4. [4] X Research source Select Link Manually and enter the code that's displayed on your TV. Once connected, you'll be able to see your console on your phone's screen. You'll also hear sounds from your PS4 (the games and the sounds coming from the web browser). Connect headphones to your phone for a better listening experience. Tap the microphone icon to use your phone's mic. Join a Discord call and you'll be able to talk with those in the call using the web browser on your PS4.
